language.name: 当心你的头
language.tips_1: 点击屏幕收集白块，注意别碰黑块哦！
language.tips_2: 观看广告可获得金币收入。
language.tips_3: 刷新纪录！每天仅有一次机会通过分享保存记录哦！是否分享？
language.tips_4: 是否花费N金币保存进度？
language.tips_5: 没有刷新纪录，不需要保存哦！
language.rate_desc: 如果你喜欢我们的游戏，就给予我们一些建议吧！

language.name: WatchTheBlack
language.tips_1: Tap the screen to collect the white block, pay attention not to touched black blocks !
language.tips_3: New Record!You only have one chance to save record by sharing each day. Comfirm?
language.tips_4: Save record will cost your N coins. Comfirm?
language.tips_5: Not a new record, no need to save.
language.rate_desc: If you like this game, feel free to give us some suggestion.
